title: provisions of the Courts of Justice Act 1953, section 15, by virtue of the powers
heading: 1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Rules of the Superior Courts
text_raw:
1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Rules of the Superior Courts 
(Powers of Attorney) 2022, shall come into operation on the 26th day of April
text_norm: 1 (1) rule may cited rule superior court (powers attorney) 2022 shall come operation 26th day april

title: provisions of the Courts of Justice Act 1953, section 15, by virtue of the powers
heading: (2) These Rules shall be construed together with the Rules of the Superior
text_raw:
2022. 

(2) These Rules shall be construed together with the Rules of the Superior 

Courts. 

(3) The Rules of the Superior Courts as amended by these Rules may be cited 

as the Rules of the Superior Courts 1986 to 2022.

title: provisions of the Courts of Justice Act 1953, section 15, by virtue of the powers
heading: 2. The Rules of the Superior Courts (No. 1)(Powers of Attorney Act 1996)
text_raw:
2. The Rules of the Superior Courts (No. 1)(Powers of Attorney Act 1996) 
2000 (S.I. No. 66 of 2000) are amended by the insertion immediately following 
Regulation 3 thereof of the following Regulation: 

The forms set out in the Appendix shall be inserted into the Rules 
“4. 
of the Superior Courts as Appendix MM, immediately following Appendix 
LL.”
text_norm: 2 rule superior court (no 1)(powers attorney act 1996) 2000 (s.i no 66 2000) amended insertion immediately following regulation 3 thereof following regulation form set appendix shall inserted rule 4 superior court appendix mm immediately following appendix ll

title: provisions of the Courts of Justice Act 1953, section 15, by virtue of the powers
heading: 3. Order 129 of the Rules of the Superior Courts is amended by the
text_raw:
3. Order 129 of the Rules of the Superior Courts is amended by the 
substitution therein for “the Appendix hereto” of “Appendix MM” in each place 
where it occurs and by the insertion in sub-rule (6) of rule 3 of “in Appendix MM” 
following the words “be in the Form No 3 or No 4”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [185]
text_norm: 3 order 129 rule superior court amended substitution therein appendix hereto appendix mm place occurs insertion sub-rule (6) rule 3 appendix mm following word form 3 4  notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 22nd april 2022 4 185

title: provisions of the Courts of Justice Act 1953, section 15, by virtue of the powers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Rules amend S.I. No. 66 of 2000 by the insertion of Regulation 4 to provide 
that the forms set out in the appendix be inserted into the Rules of the Superior 
Courts as Appendix MM and amend Order 129, rules 3(1) and (6), 4(1) and 5(4) 
to refer to Appendix MM.
